      Methods in wrapScienceJ.resource that return ResourceCore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResourceCore ResourceCore.addMetaData(MetaDataRetriever config)
      Adds some container to store, retrieve and access the metadata of this image.
      ResourceCore ResourceCore.duplicate()
      Duplicates the image (invocation of the operation)
      ResourceCore ResourceCore.mergeMetaData(ResourceCore resource)
      Adds some metadata to a resource by copying it from another resource.
      ResourceCore ResourceCore.retrieveMetaData()
      Allows to retrieve the resource's Metadata, either from a config file or from a dialog box, depending on the retrieval policy for each metadata set.
      ResourceCore ResourceCore.setTitle(java.lang.String title)
      Sets the image's title in the ImagePlus data.
      ResourceCore ResourceCore.writeToFile(java.lang.String destinationFilePath)
      Save the image to a file on the disk.
      ResourceCore ResourceCore.writeToFileWithMetaData(java.lang.String directory, java.lang.String basename, java.lang.String extension)
      Writes the image to a file, including the metadata
